import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaArrowRight, FaStar, FaTruck, FaShieldAlt, FaCreditCard, FaHeart, FaShoppingBag, FaUser, FaSearch, FaInstagram, FaTwitter, FaFacebook } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Livraison Express", description: "Livraison gratuite en 24h pour toute commande supérieure à 50€", color: "from-blue-500 to-cyan-500" }, { icon: , title: "Sécurité Totale", description: "Paiement 100% sécurisé avec cryptage SSL et protection des données", color: "from-green-500 to-emerald-500" }, { icon: , title: "Retours Gratuits", description: "30 jours pour changer d'avis, retours et échanges gratuits", color: "from-purple-500 to-pink-500" }, { icon: , title: "Service Premium", description: "Conseils personnalisés et service client disponible 7j/7", color: "from-red-500 to-rose-500" } ]; const categories = [ { name: "Hauts", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=hauts", description: "T-shirts, chemises, pulls et plus" }, { name: "Bas", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=bas", description: "Jeans, pantalons, shorts" }, { name: "Robes", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=robes", description: "Robes élégantes et décontractées" }, { name: "Vestes", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551028719-00167b16eac5?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=vestes", description: "Vestes et manteaux tendance" } ]; const trendingProducts = [ { name: "T-shirt Premium", price: "29.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1521572163474-6864f9cf17ab?w=400", badge: "Nouveau" }, { name: "Jean Slim Fit", price: "79.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=400", badge: "Populaire" }, { name: "Robe d'Été", price: "89.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=400", badge: "Promo" } ]; return (

Très satisfait !" }, { name: "Sophie M.", rating: 5, comment: "Une boutique en ligne fiable avec des produits tendance." } ].map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.comment}"

{testimonial.name}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

); }; export default Home;
